Mensesneg Pratikno ; Presiden Joko Widodo Masih Mencari Figur Dewas KPK
04 Nov 2019, 15:06 by Rini Hairani


Mensesneg Pratikno ; Presiden Joko Widodo Masih Mencari Figur Dewas KPK

KBRN,  Jakarta : Menteri Sekretaris Negara Pratikno mengatakan Presiden Joko Widodo akan memilih langsung anggota Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK untuk pertama kalinya.Menurut Pratikno, Kepala Negara masih meminta saran dan masukan dari berbagai pihak terkait sosok - sosok yang dapat mengawal kerja pimpinan KPK yang baru." Dewan pengawas kan Presiden masih banyak waktu. Nanti diangkat bersamaan dengan pimpinan KPK yang baru. Masih bulan Desember. Sementara ini Pak Presiden setiap saat ketemu, selalu meminta masukan kira-kira siapa untuk menjadi dewas. Intinya kan mengawal kerja pimpinan KPK yang baru," kata Pratikno di gedung Krida Bhakti, Jl Veteran III, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (04/11/2019).Mantan Rektor UGM ini mengungkapkan nantinya jajaran dewas itu akan banyak diisi oleh figur yang berlatarbelakang hukum." Macam-macam. Tentu saja ahli hukum yang akan banyak ya, tapi juga ada non-hukum, ada dimensi sosialnya muncul. Tapi belum diputuskan final. Sekarang masih listing lah," ungkapnya. Aturan soal penunjukan anggota Dewas KPK, tertuang dalam UU Nomor 19/2019 tentang KPK. Sebelumnya, Presiden Jokowi menyatakan masih menampung masukan-masukan pembentukan Dewas KPK. Nantinya anggota Dewas untuk pertama kalinya dipilih langsung oleh Jokowi, bukan melalui panitia seleksi (pansel) sesuai dengan UU KPK yang baru."Saat ini untuk Dewan Pengawas KPK kita masih dalam proses mendapatkan masukan-masukan untuk siapa yang nanti duduk di dalam Dewan Pengawas KPK," ujar Jokowi di Kompleks Istana, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (01/11/2019) lalu. (RH)

Nov 04 2019, 15:06 by Rini Hairani


Minister of State Secretary Pratikno; President Joko Widodo Still Looking for KPK's Dewas Figure

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of State Secretary Pratikno said President Joko Widodo would directly elect KPK Supervisory Board members for the first time. According to Pratikno, the Head of State was still asking for advice and input from various parties related to figures who could oversee the work of KPK leaders who new. "The President's supervisory board still has a lot of time. Later it will be appointed together with the new KPK leadership. Still in December. While the President is meeting at any time, he always asks for input about who to become a victim. The point is to oversee the work of the KPK leadership new, "Pratikno said in the Krida Bhakti building, Jl Veteran III, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). The former UGM Chancellor revealed later that the ranks of the elderly will be filled with many figures with legal backgrounds." Various. Of course. "There are only a lot of legal experts, but there are also non-laws, there is a social dimension that appears. But it has not been decided on the final. Now it is still listing," he said. The rules regarding the appointment of Dewas KPK members are contained in Law Number 19/2019 regarding the KPK. Previously, President Jokowi said that he was still accommodating inputs for the formation of the Dewas KPK. Later on, Dewas members will be directly elected by Jokowi for the first time, not through a selection committee (pansel) in accordance with the new KPK Law. "Currently for the KPK Supervisory Board we are still in the process of getting input for who will sit on the KPK Supervisory Board , "Jokowi said at the Palace Complex, Central Jakarta, last Friday (01/11/2019).
